trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection" /> interface provides methods that indicate whether a client is authorized to connect on the current channel, based on the client's network address and user identity.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection" /> 介面提供方法，根據用戶端的網路位址和使用者識別，指出用戶端是否獲得連接目前通道的授權。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: 它提供單一點的所有傳入連線的授權<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>。

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓呼叫端的授權之前任何傳入訊息還原序列化為從不受信任來源的安全性威脅降至最低。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> that identifies the network address of the client.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" />，識別用戶端的網路位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the network address of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林 (Boolean) 值，指出用戶端的網路位址是否獲得連接目前通道的授權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the network address of the client is authorized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端的網路位址獲得授權，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: 它提供單一點的所有傳入連線的授權<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>。

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓呼叫端的授權之前任何傳入訊息還原序列化為從不受信任來源的安全性威脅降至最低。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IIdentity" /> that represents the user identity of the client.
Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether the user identity of the client is authorized to connect on the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指出用戶端的使用者識別是否獲得連接目前通道的授權。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user identity of the client is authorized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端的使用者識別獲得授權，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection> interface is passed to <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel.%23ctor%28System.Collections.IDictionary%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider%2CSystem.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IAuthorizeRemotingConnection%29>.
It provides a single point of authorization for all incoming connections on a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>.
trans-unit.target: 它提供單一點的所有傳入連線的授權<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpServerChannel>。

trans-unit.source: It allows for the authorization of the caller before any incoming messages are deserialized to minimize the security threat from untrusted sources.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓呼叫端的授權之前任何傳入訊息還原序列化為從不受信任來源的安全性威脅降至最低。
